name: Good Morning Fox
description:
It can not stop ! Run Fox run !

Help the fox to catch all the chickens and collect all their eggs on beautiful 3D planets !

-------------------------------------------------

Catch all the chickens and collect all their eggs on beautiful 3D planets in this multi-directional runner game, clone of famous Sonic the Hedgehog 3 special stage.

Your reflexes will be tested to complete the 24 progressive difficulty levels by planet. Watch out for traps !

Beat the high scores of your friends or sacrifice some points to continue the game.

<< Watch the gameplay video >>
